bot_missing_permissions: Hm, I can't seem to do that.
I need higher level access for that.
I can't seem to find a way to do that.
My access levels are too low to do that.
user_missing_permissions: You don't have high enough access level for that.
I can't let you do that.
Sorry, but I couldn't do anything.

query_fail: I couldn't find any relevant information.
